languages.text: "Заглядывайте на огонек, Лорд-капитан. То есть нет!" {n}Он поспешно машет руками.{/n} "Бегите, если видите инфернуса рядом с открытым огнем. Это наша гильдейская дурацкая шутка".

"Never let your fire go out, Lord Captain — I mean, no!" {n}Einrich hurriedly waves his hands.{/n} "That's just a stupid little guild in-joke. Seriously, if you see an infernus next to a naked flame, run."
languages.original_text: "Заглядывайте на огонек, Лорд-капитан. То есть нет!" {n}Он поспешно машет руками.{/n} "Бегите, если видите инфернуса рядом с открытым огнем. Это наша гильдейская дурацкая шутка".

traits.locale_text: "Never let your fire go out, Lord Captain. I mean, no!" {n}Einrich hurriedly waves his hands.{/n} "If you see an Infernus next to a naked flame, run. This is our guild's stupid joke."
"Never let your fire go out, Lord Captain. I mean, no!" {n}Einrich hurriedly waves his hands.{/n} "If you see an Infernus next to a naked flame, run. This is our guild's stupid joke."
"Never let your fire go out, Lord Captain. I mean, no!" {n}Einrich hurriedly waves his hands.{/n} "If you see an Infernus next to a naked flame, run. This is our guild's stupid little in-joke."
"Never let your fire go out, Lord Captain. I mean, no!" {n}Einrich hurriedly waves his hands.{/n} "If you see an Infernus next to a naked flame, run. This is our guild's stupid little in-joke."

"Never let your fire go out, Lord Captain — I mean, no!" {n}Einrich hurriedly waves his hands.{/n} "That's just a stupid little guild in-joke. Seriously, if you see an infernus next to a naked flame, run."

"Never let your fire go out, Lord Captain — I mean, no!" {n}Einrich hurriedly waves his hands.{/n} "That's just a stupid little guild in-joke. Seriously, if you see an infernus next to a naked flame, run."

languages.text: « Ne laissez jamais votre flamme s'éteindre, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Euh, mince, non ! {n}s'exclame Einrich en agitant précipitamment les mains dans un geste de déni.{/n} Pardon, c'est une blague stupide entre nous. Sérieusement, si vous voyez un infernus près d'une flamme, fuyez. »
languages.original_text: "Never let your fire go out, Lord Captain — I mean, no!" {n}Einrich hurriedly waves his hands.{/n} "That's just a stupid little guild in-joke. Seriously, if you see an infernus next to a naked flame, run."

traits.locale_text: « Ne laissez jamais votre flamme s'éteindre, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Euh, mince, non ! {n}s'exclame Einrich en agitant précipitamment les mains dans un geste de déni.{/n} Pardon, c'est une blague stupide entre nous. Sérieusement, si vous voyez un infernus près d'une flamme, fuyez. »

languages.text: «Nunca deje que sus llamas se extingan, Lord Capitán... esto, ¡no!». {n}Einrich se apresura a agitar las manos.{/n} «Es una broma tonta del gremio. En serio, si ve a un infernus junto a un fuego no controlado, corra».
languages.original_text: "Never let your fire go out, Lord Captain — I mean, no!" {n}Einrich hurriedly waves his hands.{/n} "That's just a stupid little guild in-joke. Seriously, if you see an infernus next to a naked flame, run."

traits.locale_text: «Nunca deje que sus llamas se extingan, Lord Capitán... esto, ¡no!». {n}Einrich se apresura a agitar las manos.{/n} «Es una broma tonta del gremio. En serio, si ve a un infernus junto a un fuego no controlado, corra».

languages.text: “不要玩火，舰长大人！我是说，真的！”{n}艾因里奇连忙挥了挥手。{/n}“噢，这只是我们这行的愚蠢的玩笑话。不过说真的，如果您看到我们的人在忙着灭火，赶紧跑就是了。”
languages.original_text: "Never let your fire go out, Lord Captain — I mean, no!" {n}Einrich hurriedly waves his hands.{/n} "That's just a stupid little guild in-joke. Seriously, if you see an infernus next to a naked flame, run."

traits.locale_text: “不要玩火，舰长大人！我是说，真的！”{n}艾因里奇连忙挥了挥手。{/n}“噢，这只是我们这行的愚蠢的玩笑话。不过说真的，如果您看到我们的人在忙着灭火，赶紧跑就是了。”

languages.text: 「自身の火を消さないでください、ロード・キャプテン。いや、そうでなくて！」{n}アインリッヒは急いで手を振った。{/n}「これはギルド内の馬鹿げた身内の冗談です。ともかく、裸火のそばでインフェルヌスを見かけたら、逃げてください」
languages.original_text: "Never let your fire go out, Lord Captain — I mean, no!" {n}Einrich hurriedly waves his hands.{/n} "That's just a stupid little guild in-joke. Seriously, if you see an infernus next to a naked flame, run."

traits.locale_text: 「自身の火を消さないでください、ロード・キャプテン。いや、そうでなくて！」{n}アインリッヒは急いで手を振った。{/n}「これはギルド内の馬鹿げた身内の冗談です。ともかく、裸火のそばでインフェルヌスを見かけたら、逃げてください」

languages.text: "Lasst Euer Feuer nie erlöschen, Lord Captain — ich meine, nein!" {n}Einrich winkt eilig ab.{/n} "Das ist nur ein blöder kleiner Insiderwitz in der Gilde. Ganz im Ernst, wenn Ihr einen Infernus neben einer nackten Flamme seht, dann lauft."
languages.original_text: "Never let your fire go out, Lord Captain — I mean, no!" {n}Einrich hurriedly waves his hands.{/n} "That's just a stupid little guild in-joke. Seriously, if you see an infernus next to a naked flame, run."

traits.locale_text: "Lasst Euer Feuer nie erlöschen, Lord Captain — ich meine, nein!" {n}Einrich winkt eilig ab.{/n} "Das ist nur ein blöder kleiner Insiderwitz in der Gilde. Ganz im Ernst, wenn Ihr einen Infernus neben einer nackten Flamme seht, dann lauft."

languages.text: "İçinizdeki ateş hiç sönmesin Lord Kaptan. Pardon, yok!" {n}Einrich, telaşla ellerini sallıyor.{/n} "Aptalca bir lonca şakası. Gerçekten, eğer açık ateşin yanında bir itfacı görürseniz doğrudan kaçın."
languages.original_text: "Never let your fire go out, Lord Captain — I mean, no!" {n}Einrich hurriedly waves his hands.{/n} "That's just a stupid little guild in-joke. Seriously, if you see an infernus next to a naked flame, run."
